医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
深度学习将蛋白质设计提高了 10 倍了解蛋白质的关键——；例如那些控制癌症、COVID-19 和其他疾病的疾病 -；很简单。确定它们的化学结构并找出哪些其他蛋白质可以与它们结合。但有一个问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230803/Deep-learning-improves- Protein-design-by-10x.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230803/Deep-learning-improves- Protein-design-by-10x.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0b6c35a7-ee34-405a-b804-b3c3b1304c0c Thu, 03 Aug 2023 21:08:37 -0400 Deep learning improves protein design by 10x
放射组学和临床数据有助于提高儿科克罗恩病的诊断准确性《美国伦琴学杂志》(AJR) 上发表的一篇已被接受的手稿发现，利用 T2 加权 MRI 数据部署基于放射组学的模型可以提高儿科克罗恩病 (CD) 的诊断准确性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230803/Radiomic-and-clinical-data-could-help-increase-diagnostic-accuracy-for-pediatric-Crohn-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230803/Radiomic-and-clinical-data-could-help-increase-diagnostic-accuracy-for-pediatric-Crohn-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6504edff-fa1c-44ec-9336-559be904367f Thu, 03 Aug 2023 21:02:26 -0400 Radiomic and clinical data could help increase diagnostic accuracy for pediatric Crohn disease
除非美国人改变三个关键危险因素，否则致命的冠心病可能会再次上升经过几十年的下降之后，致命的冠心病可能会再次上升，除非美国人改变吸烟、饮酒和肥胖这三个主要危险因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230803/Fatal-coronary-heart-disease-may-rise-again-unless-Americans-modify- Three-key-risk-factors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230803/Fatal-coronary-heart-disease-may-rise-again-unless-Americans-modify- Three-key-risk-factors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=852a9552-388a-4156-b003-e2f332777719 Thu, 03 Aug 2023 20:52:15 -0400 Fatal coronary heart disease may rise again unless Americans modify three key risk factors
薄荷油可能是心脏直视手术后缓解疼痛的新选择一项小型比较临床试验的结果表明，使用薄荷油芳香疗法可以缓解心脏直视手术后的疼痛严重程度，并提高睡眠质量，该试验在线发表在《BMJ 支持与姑息治疗》杂志上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230803/Peppermint-oil-may-be-new-option-for-pain-relief-after-open-heart-surgery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230803/Peppermint-oil-may-be-new-option-for-pain-relief-after-open-heart-surgery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=437c15f5-1d4c-4664-a4eb-c784a1740a6d Thu, 03 Aug 2023 20:41:45 -0400 Peppermint oil may be new option for pain relief after open heart surgery
独立部门帮助削减 NHS 等候名单卫生和社会保障部长史蒂夫·巴克莱 (Steve Barclay) 今天宣布，作为政府利用独立部门削减 NHS 等候名单的计划的一部分，正在全国范围内启动 13 个新的社区诊断中心 (CDC)，其中包括 8 个独立运营的 CDC。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230803/Independent-sector-to-help-cut-NHS-waiting-lists.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230803/Independent-sector-to-help-cut-NHS-waiting-lists.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a39d3e67-48ec-48db-8c1f-53953be63fdc Thu, 03 Aug 2023 20:33:26 -0400 Independent sector to help cut NHS waiting lists
两个关键基因的表达影响癌症进展组织、血管、细胞：肿瘤在称为肿瘤微环境的复杂生态系统中发育。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230803/Expression-of-two-key-genes-influences-cancer-progression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230803/Expression-of-two-key-genes-influences-cancer-progression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9a79dda3-7d80-45a7-9a3f-68194d319461 Thu, 03 Aug 2023 20:29:26 -0400 Expression of two key genes influences cancer progression
童年创伤可能会增加怀孕期间并发症的风险昆士兰大学研究人员领导的一项研究发现，在儿童时期经历过虐待、家庭暴力或家庭药物滥用的女性在怀孕期间出现并发症的风险更高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230803/Childhood-trauma-may-increase-risk-of-complications-during-pregnancy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230803/Childhood-trauma-may-increase-risk-of-complications-during-pregnancy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ba20b446-478b-40ee-b868-f70677ebde83 Thu, 03 Aug 2023 20:22:01 -0400 Childhood trauma may increase risk of complications during pregnancy
关键免疫调节剂的惊人新作用被揭示一种称为 STING 的信号蛋白是人类免疫系统中的关键参与者，它可以检测细胞内的危险迹象，然后激活各种防御机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230803/Surprising-new-role-for-a-key-immune-regulator-revealed.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230803/Surprising-new-role-for-a-key-immune-regulator-revealed.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2744069a-db03-4759-b25e-0eed7d69f3dc Thu, 03 Aug 2023 20:18:34 -0400 Surprising new role for a key immune regulator revealed
研究揭示胰岛素样生长因子促进大脑可塑性的机制马克斯普朗克佛罗里达神经科学研究所的研究发现了胰岛素样生长因子促进大脑可塑性的机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230803/Study-reveals-mechanism-through-which-insulin-like-growth-factors-facilitate-brain- Plasticity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230803/Study-reveals-mechanism-through-which-insulin-like-growth-factors-facilitate-brain- Plasticity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d1d09ce2-54d3-4112-ba4a-e4a140e385a4 Thu, 03 Aug 2023 20:14:09 -0400 Study reveals mechanism through which insulin-like growth factors facilitate brain plasticity
空气污染与老年人非肺癌风险增加有关哈佛大学陈曾熙公共卫生学院领导的一项研究表明，长期接触细颗粒空气污染物 (PM2.5) 和二氧化氮 (NO2) 可能会增加老年人患非肺癌的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230803/Air-pollution-linked-to-increased-risk-of-non-lung-cancers-in-older-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230803/Air-pollution-linked-to-increased-risk-of-non-lung-cancers-in-older-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5241d9dd-825d-4bf3-902b-04f6c7908e23 Thu, 03 Aug 2023 20:09:31 -0400 Air pollution linked to increased risk of non-lung cancers in older adults
